alert.note: Alert for Gallatin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 11 at 7:23PM MDT until June 16 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Montana... Gallatin River near DCP-Gallatin R/Gateway affecting Gallatin County. Gallatin River at Logan affecting Gallatin County. .Heavy rain may fall on a deep primed snowpack leading to the melt increasing. Flows in rivers may increase quickly and reach critical levels. For the Gallatin River...including DCP-Gallatin R/Gateway and Logan...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Gallatin River at Logan. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.8 feet, Water may be on small bridges and around railroad bridge footing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM MDT Saturday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Sunday morning at 1000 AM MDT.
